revision.text:
{{DYK talk|14 January|2009|entry=... that '''[[Jeffrey A. Lockwood|Jeffrey Lockwood]]''' provides historical examples of [[Reduviidae|assassin bugs]], buckets of [[scorpion]]s, and [[catapult]]ed "[[beehive|bee]] bombs" as [[entomological warfare]] in his book, '''''[[Six-legged Soldiers: Using Insects as Weapons of War]]'''''?|views=4012}} {{WikiProjectBannerShell|1= {{WikiProject Books|class = Start |needs-infobox-cover = yes |listas = Six-legged Soldiers: Using Insects as Weapons of War }} {{WikiProject Insects|class=start|importance=mid}} {{WikiProject Military history|class=start <!-- B-Class 5-criteria checklist --> <!-- B-Class-1. It is suitably referenced, and all major points have appropriate inline citations. --> |B1=yes <!-- B-Class-2. It reasonably covers the topic, and does not contain obvious omissions or inaccuracies. --> |B2=yes <!-- B-Class-3. It has a defined structure, including a lead section and one or more sections of content. --> |B3=yes <!-- B-Class-4. It is free from major grammatical errors. --> |B4=yes <!-- B-Class-5. It contains appropriate supporting materials, such as an infobox, images, or diagrams. --> |B5=yes |Science=yes |Weaponry= yes }} }}
== External links modified ==
Hello fellow Wikipedians,
I have just added archive links to {{plural:1|one external link|1 external links}} on [[Six-legged Soldiers]]. Please take a moment to review [https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?diff=prev&oldid=701763316 my edit]. If necessary, add {{tlx|cbignore}} after the link to keep me from modifying it. Alternatively, you can add {{tlx|nobots|deny{{=}}InternetArchiveBot}} to keep me off the page altogether. I made the following changes: *Added archive https://web.archive.org/20090107173633/http://www.publishersweekly.com/article/CA6587574.html to http://www.publishersweekly.com/article/CA6587574.html
When you have finished reviewing my changes, please set the ''checked'' parameter below to '''true''' to let others know.
{{sourcecheck|checked=false}}
Cheers.â€”[[User:Cyberbot II|<sup style="color:green;font-family:Courier">cyberbot II]]<small><sub style="margin-left:-14.9ex;color:green;font-family:Comic Sans MS">[[User talk:Cyberbot II|<span style="color:green">Talk to my owner]]:Online</sub></small> 12:49, 26 January 2016 (UTC)
